description: Main source file for the Tic Tac Toe frontend app built with Flutter. Defines theme, main widget, game state management, UI components, and interactions.

classes.name: _OceanColors
classes.description: Defines a color palette for the Ocean Professional theme.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up theme and home screen for the app.

classes.name: TicTacToeHome
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main game screen with game logic, scoreboard, and controls.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying player scores with visual emphasis.

classes.name: _BoardTile
classes.description: Stateful widget representing an individual Tic Tac Toe cell with animations and tap handling.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Tic Tac Toe Flutter app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the ThemeData configured with the Ocean palette.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the root app widget, returning MaterialApp.

methods.name: _loadScores
methods.description: Asynchronously loads saved scores from shared preferences.

methods.name: _persistScores
methods.description: Saves current scores to shared preferences for persistence.

methods.name: _resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to initial empty state.

methods.name: _resetScores
methods.description: Resets player scores to zero and persists the changes.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles a tap on a board cell, updating game state, checking for winner, and triggering dialogs.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner or draw, returning result details.

methods.name: _showEndDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog at game end with options to play again or close.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Constructs the header UI with scores and turn indicator.

methods.name: _buildGrid
methods.description: Builds the Tic Tac Toe grid with animated cells.

methods.name: _buildControls
methods.description: Provides control buttons for resetting the board and scores.

methods.name: _confirmResetScores
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before resetting scores.

methods.name: _showMenu
methods.description: Displays a menu with options to reset scores or the board.
